text: Choosing a Husband is a 1909 American silent drama movie directed by D. W. GriffithChoosing a HusbandCHOOSING A HUSBAND and stars Florence Barker, Kate Bruce, and Charles Craig. ==Actors== * Florence Barker as Gladys * Kate Bruce * Charles Craig as Bachelor * Anthony O'Sullivan as Bachelor * Billy Quirk as Bachelor * Mack Sennett as Bachelor * Blanche Sweet as One of Gladys' Friends * Henry B. Walthall as Harry * Dorothy West as One of Gladys' Friends ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1909 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:American silent movies Category:Movies directed by D. W. Griffith
title: Choosing a Husband
